meta.description: Buy airport lounge access. Learn how to access London Heathrow Airport (LHR) lounges with a day pass, airline status, membership, or credit card.

location.terminalDirections: After Passport Control, turn right and take the escalator down one level. The restaurant is located on the left hand side, near Gates A20 - A21.
Arrivals Hall.
After security on Level 5, next to the Gorgeous Kitchen and Lufthansa Senator Lounge.
After Passport Control and Security Checkpoint, turn right and proceed to the end of the hallway.
Level 5, next to Aer Lingus Lounge
Level 4, near the World Duty Free Shop and Terminal Transfers Area (marked as A3 Lounge on signage).
Near Gate B44.
Take the lift or stairs opposite Gate B44 up to the lounge entrance
Opposite Gate B46.
Opposite Gate B46.
Departure Level, after Duty Free, Lounge Area H
Exit to the right after the Terminal 3 Customs Hall, take the stairs or lift to Level 2.

lounges.name: American Airlines International First Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: After Passport Control, exit Duty Free Area and turn right toward Lounge Area H.
Zone F, located along the corridor leading to Gates 13-22.
Zone F, located along the corridor leading to Gates 13-22
Lounge C in the Central Concourse, near Gate 11.
Lounge C in the Central Concourse, near Gate 11.
Located near Gate 9, lounge is signposted as "Lounge D" on the right hand side.
Follow the signs to 'Lounge F' towards Gates 13-22, proceed up one level via the lift or stairs.

The Lounge is in Terminal 3 Area A. After you go through security, follow Flight Connection route Area A,  access point in the main shopping and dining area to Level 2 accessible by taking the elevators.
Zone E, Level 1, along corridor with Gates 1-11
Zone B, located in the Central Concourse, near Gate 11, next to the Cathay Pacific Lounge.
Located in the Upper Class Wing.
5 minute walk from customs, just off the Arrivals Hall

lounges.name: Blush Lounge by Plaza Premium Group

location.terminalDirections: Located near Gate 2.
Opposite Gate 10, take the stairs or elevator down one level to the entrance. Next to the SkyTeam Lounge.
Between Gate 6 and 7, 1st Floor
Opposite Gates 10A and 10B.
Located opposite Gate 6 below the Qatar Airways Premium Lounge.
After security, opposite Gate 6.
Southern end of Terminal 5

lounges.name: British Airways The Galleries Arrivals Lounge

location.terminalDirections: Located on the 1st Floor using the orange lifts, outside check-in and security.
After the Security Checkpoint, Level 2, next to Gate A7.
North Concourse
South Concourse
Terminal 5A South - Located at South Concourse after Check-In
Entrance is just after security.
Located to the left of Gate A18 in the Main Departure Terminal.
Follow the signs in Terminal 5B Departure Concourse
